page.title: 04STRAW BURNING
page.content:
We were suprised to find that the burning of straw following the harvest did not arouse a great deal of local comment. This depite the fact that in recent years the burning of stuble has been highly controversial with many people actively campaigning to control it.
Amongst the older retired people there are also problems of getting to the shops. Although there are some general stores they do not suuply all the peoples needs and most people have to get into Romsey or perhaps Salisbury for their shopping. There is a bus service along the main A27 Salisbury to Romsey road. However, getting to the road is not always easy.
